frontMatter.title: Introducing Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog
frontMatter.summary: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology to support your blogging needs? Checkout the Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template.

prev.title: Images in Next.js
prev.summary: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.

next.title: Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
next.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!
